itemDescription: Scottish boy who disappeared from his back garden on 23 April 1976, aged 3

wikipedia_page.main: Sandy Jardine Davidson (born 28 May 1972) is a Scottish boy who disappeared on 23 April 1976, when he was three years old, while he was playing in the back garden of his house in the Bourtreehill housing estate in Irvine, Ayrshire.
